sphereGA.cpp

00060 #include "EALib/sqr.h"
00061 #include "EALib/Population.h"
00062 
00063 //=======================================================================
00064 //
00065 // fitness function: sphere model
00066 //
00067 double sphere( const std::vector< double >& x )
00068 {
00069     unsigned i;
00070     double   sum;
00071     for( sum = 0., i = 0; i < x.size( ); i++ )
00072         sum += sqr( x[ i ] );
00073     return sum;
00074 }
00075 
00076 //=======================================================================
00077 //
00078 // main program
00079 //
00080 int main( int argc, char **argv )
00081 {
00082     //
00083     // constants
00084     //
00085     const unsigned PopSize     = 50;
00086     const unsigned Dimension   = 20;
00087     const unsigned NumOfBits   = 10;
00088     const unsigned Iterations  = 2000;
00089     const unsigned DspInterval = 10;
00090     const unsigned NElitists   = 1;
00091     const unsigned Omega       = 5;
00092     const unsigned CrossPoints = 2;
00093     const double   CrossProb   = 0.6;
00094     const double   FlipProb    = 1. / ( Dimension * NumOfBits );
00095     const bool     UseGrayCode = true;
00096     const Interval RangeOfValues( -3, +5 );
00097 
00098     unsigned i, t;
00099 
00100     //
00101     // initialize random number generator
00102     //
00103     Rng::seed( argc > 1 ? atoi( argv[ 1 ] ) : 1234 );
00104 
00105     //
00106     // define populations
00107     //
00108     Population parents   ( PopSize, ChromosomeT< bool >( Dimension * NumOfBits ) );
00109     Population offsprings( PopSize, ChromosomeT< bool >( Dimension * NumOfBits ) );
00110 
00111     //
00112     // scaling window
00113     //
00114     std::vector< double > window( Omega );
00115 
00116     //
00117     // temporary chromosome for decoding
00118     //
00119     ChromosomeT< double > dblchrom;
00120 
00121     //
00122     // minimization task
00123     //
00124     parents   .setMinimize( );
00125     offsprings.setMinimize( );
00126 
00127     //
00128     // initialize all chromosomes of parent population
00129     //
00130     for( i = 0; i < parents.size( ); ++i )
00131         dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< bool >& >( parents[ i ][ 0 ] ).initialize( );
00132 
00133     //
00134     // evaluate parents (only needed for elitist strategy)
00135     //
00136     if( NElitists > 0 )
00137         for( i = 0; i < parents.size( ); ++i ) {
00138             dblchrom.decodeBinary( parents[ i ][ 0 ], RangeOfValues, NumOfBits, UseGrayCode );
00139             parents[ i ].setFitness( sphere( dblchrom ) );
00140         }
00141 
00142     //
00143     // iterate
00144     //
00145     for( t = 0; t < Iterations; ++t ) {
00146         //
00147         // recombine by crossing over two parents
00148         //
00149         offsprings = parents;
00150         for( i = 0; i < offsprings.size( )-1; i += 2 )
00151             if( Rng::coinToss( CrossProb ) )
00152                 offsprings[ i ][ 0 ].crossover( offsprings[ i+1 ][ 0 ],
00153                                                 CrossPoints );
00154 
00155         //
00156         // mutate by flipping bits
00157         //
00158         for( i = 0; i < offsprings.size( ); ++i )
00159             dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< bool >& >( offsprings[ i ][ 0 ] ).flip( FlipProb );
00160 
00161         //
00162         // evaluate objective function
00163         //
00164         for( i = 0; i < offsprings.size( ); ++i ) {
00165             dblchrom.decodeBinary( offsprings[ i ][ 0 ], RangeOfValues, NumOfBits, UseGrayCode );
00166             offsprings[ i ].setFitness( sphere( dblchrom ) );
00167         }
00168 
00169         //
00170         // scale fitness values and use proportional selection
00171         //
00172         offsprings.linearDynamicScaling( window, t );
00173         parents.selectProportional( offsprings, NElitists );
00174 
00175         //
00176         // print out best value found so far
00177         //
00178         if( t % DspInterval == 0 )
00179             std::cout << t << "\tbest value = "
00180                  << parents.best( ).fitnessValue( ) << "\n";
00181     }
00182 
00183     return 0;
00184 }
